name: ToDo icon supports the App Bar functionality

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Locate a server where the App Bar is enabled Â 
2. Upload and enable the plugin
3. Navigate to the user side
inline.expectedResult:
- The ToDo plugin icon is now in the App Bar instead of the channel header
- The Plugin icon function normally to expand the RHS

customFields.Important notes about this step:
For 1.
All test servers should have the flag enabled or you can enable the flag locally - make run-server MM_FEATUREFLAGS_AppBarEnabled=true

inline.description:
1. Locate a server where the App Bar is disabled
2. Upload and enable the plugin
3. Navigate to the user side
inline.expectedResult:
- The ToDo plugin icon will show in the channel header as App Bar is disabled
- The Plugin icon function normally to expand the RHS

customFields.Related ticket(s):
For 1.
You can disable the flag locally - make run-server MM_FEATUREFLAGS_AppBarEnabled=false (As of v6.6.0 the flag still defaults to false so you can juts leave it undefined)
